targets.expr: count(kube_pod_status_ready{condition="false",namespace="${namespace}"}==1) by(namespace) - (count(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Succeeded",namespace="${namespace}"}==1) by(namespace) or vector(0)) or count(kube_pod_status_ready{condition="false",namespace="${namespace}"}==1) by(namespace)

max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

panels.description: 展示该工作负载每个 Pod 的 CPU 使用量。

targets.expr:
group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!="",container!="POD"}[5m])) by (pod, container,image)

group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace",resource="cpu"}) by (pod, container,image)

group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",resource="cpu"}) by (pod, container,image)

panels.title: CPU Usage

targets.expr:
group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!="",container!="POD"}[5m])) by (pod, container)
/
max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",resource="cpu"}) by (pod, container))

panels.description: 展示该工作负载的每个 Pod 内存使用量。

targets.expr:
group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(container_memory_usage_bytes{container!="POD",container!="",namespace="$namespace"}) by(container, pod)

group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",resource="memory"}) by(container, pod)

group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace",resource="memory"}) by(container, pod)

panels.title: Memory Usage

targets.expr:
group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(container_memory_usage_bytes{container!="POD",container!="",namespace="$namespace"}) by(container, pod)
/
max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace",resource="memory"}) by(container, pod))

panels.description: The number of network errors including receiving and transmitting.
panels.title: Network Errors

targets.expr:
group(kube_pod_info{ namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{ namespace="$namespace", container!="POD", container!=""}[5m])) by (pod,container)

group(kube_pod_info{ namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="StatefulSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$name"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{ namespace="$namespace", container!="POD", container!=""}[5m])) by (pod,container)
